data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: The rise of on-demand streaming services is an immensely better way to view current content. After ____, ____ not ____, ____ being ____ the ____ of ____ companies ____ can ____ go cord-free! Having ____ capability ____ resume ____ whenever ____ is a win-win ____ everybody. Cable tv is on its last legs.
data.partBlankContent: The rise of on-demand streaming services is an immensely better way to view current content. After ye___, i_ not dec____, o_ being a_ the wh__ of ca___ companies w_ can fin____ go cord-free! Having t__ capability t_ resume play____ whenever wan___ is a win-win f__ everybody. Cable tv is on its last legs.
data.answer: 按需流媒体服务的兴起是观看当前内容的一个好得多的方式。经过几年，如果不是几十年，受有线电视公司心血来潮的影响，我们终于可以无线了!拥有在需要的时候恢复播放的能力对每个人来说都是双赢的。有线电视快完蛋了。
